ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from setting Application status to Accepted if the Max Num of Cards can approve is above their user's limit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Application_Status__c) = "Accepted", BEGINS($UserRole.Name , "WES Credit"), CreditLevelRequestApproved__c = FALSE, Total_Fuel_Cards_Needed__c > $User.WES_MaxCardsCanApprove__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must submit an Approval Request if the Number of Cards needed is above User's cards limit.
